buildCommand: git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable --depth 1 && ./flutter/bin/flutter config --enable-web && ./flutter/bin/flutter pub get && ./flutter/bin/flutter build web --release --web-renderer canvaskit --dart-define=ENABLE_BACKEND=$ENABLE_BACKEND --dart-define=FIREBASE_API_KEY=$FIREBASE_API_KEY --dart-define=FIREBASE_APP_ID=$FIREBASE_APP_ID --dart-define=FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID=$FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID --dart-define=FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID=$FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID --dart-define=FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN=$FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN --dart-define=FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET=$FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET --dart-define=FIREBASE_MEASUREMENT_ID=$FIREBASE_MEASUREMENT_ID --dart-define=GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY=$GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY
